title: Strings
message:
1. To access string you can use bracket and  dot notation.

Examples 
* 	lastname.length;     -- to find the length of a string
* 	firstLetterOfLastName = lastName[0];    -- to access the specific digit of the string
* 	var lastLetterOfLastName = lastName[lastName.length - 1];  -- to find the last letter of the sting -- or the nTH digit  like so:

var secondToLastLetterOfLastName = lastName[lastName.length - 2];

YOU CAN NOT reasign a digit within a string, you have to reassign the entire string.
